thread.title: 43 Valentine's Day Gifts for People Who Love Their Dogs
thread.title_full: 43 Valentine's Day Gifts for People Who Love Their Dogs

title: 43 Valentine's Day Gifts for People Who Love Their Dogs
text: 43 Valentine's Day Gifts for the Person Who Treats Their Dog Better Than All Their Friends The dog days are here to stay. Share via Twitter Valentine's Day is a prime time to show the dog mom or dad in your life some love. Whether you're looking for Valentine's Day gifts for your friend who follows dozens of cute pups on Instagram, your partner who snuggles their dog in bed more than they snuggle you, or a parent who insists on including Spot in family photos, you've got loads of gift ideas to choose from. We've rounded up our favorites here, just to make your life a little easier. There are adorable accessories, like a grooming kit and the most precious little doggy sweater. But there are also lots of doggy-themed clothing picks the puppy lover in your life can wear, plus dog-inspired décor so they can display their obsession loud and proud. And, of course, they need some cleaning supplies—because man's best friend can get a little bit messy. Dive into the gift guide below to see our selects, and prepare to unleash some true happiness this Valentine's Day. Puppies Make Me Happy
